# isAnimating()

**Instance Method**

Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the sticker is animating.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func isAnimating() -> Bool
```

## Return Value

Returns [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the sticker is animating; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Controlling Sticker Animation

- **animationDuration**: The amount of time it takes to complete the sticker’s animation.
- **startAnimating()**: Starts the sticker’s animation, beginning with the first frame.
- **stopAnimating()**: Stops the sticker’s animation.
